Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Dupont Boucher Dubois at a charity gala in Paris. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Dupont Boucher Dubois is a 42 year old Regulatory Affairs Director from France. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Dupont Boucher Dubois is currently widowed. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2000, Dupont finished his secondary school education at Lycée Polyvalent François Mauriac.
Dupont attended IUT de Strasbourg and graduated in 2006.
Occupation History:
Dupont Boucher Dubois is a 42 year old Regulatory Affairs Director from France. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At Servier Laboratories, Dupont Boucher Dubois held the position of Research Scientist from 2006 to 2007, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Clinical Trials Manager at Servier Laboratories in 2009, further expanding his skill set.
He spent 14 years working as a Regulatory Affairs Director at Servier Laboratories, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 280000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns 2 exceptional properties: villa located in Tours, valued at approximately 3,530,000.00 EUR, townhouse located in Saint-Denis, valued at approximately 1,900,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases his flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Saint-Denis and Tours.
He inherited a significant sum of 2340000 EUR from his mother, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2012, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
